sentences.en: "Is this what you were looking for?" Bradley produced the handkerchief.
sentences.cn: “你刚才找的是不是这个？”布拉德利掏出那块手绢。

sentences.en: Before sweeping the house she bound up her hair in a large handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 打扫房屋前， 她把头发用一块大手帕扎起来。

sentences.en: Blake held his handkerchief over the mouthpiece to muffle his voice.
sentences.cn: 布莱克把手绢包在话筒上，以使自己的声音听起来模糊不清。

sentences.en: Diving into her bag, she found a handkerchief just in time.
sentences.cn: 她迅速地在她的皮包里翻了一下, 正好找到了一块手帕.

sentences.en: He flicked at spot with handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地用手帕拂拭污点。

sentences.en: He pulled a handkerchief from his pocket and gave it to him.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出手绢递给他。

sentences.en: He took a handkerchief from his pocket and lightly wiped his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出手帕，轻轻擦了擦嘴。

sentences.en: He took out a handkerchief and blew his nose.
sentences.cn: 他掏出一块手帕，擤了擤鼻子。

sentences.en: He whipped out a handkerchief to bind up his finger.
sentences.cn: 他迅速地抽出一块手帕来包扎手指.

sentences.en: He yanked a handkerchief out of his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里拽出一条手帕。

sentences.en: Her sister broke down, sobbing into her handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 她姐姐再也控制不住自己的情绪，捂着手绢呜咽起来。

sentences.en: Put a handkerchief over your mouth when you sneeze.
sentences.cn: 打喷嚏时用手帕捂住嘴.

sentences.en: She balled the handkerchief up and threw it at his feet.
sentences.cn: 她把手绢揉成一团，丢在了他的脚边。

sentences.en: She fumbled in her pocket for a handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 她在她口袋里胡乱摸找手帕。

sentences.en: She lowered the handkerchief which she had kept dabbing at her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她放下了那块一直用来擦眼睛的手帕。

sentences.en: She was crying and dabbing at her eyes with a handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 她一边哭一边用手绢轻按眼睛.

sentences.en: She waved away his offer of the handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 她挥手拒绝了他递过来的手帕。

sentences.en: Tom tried to staunch the blood with his handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 汤姆试图用手帕来止血。

trans.tran_en: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your nose or eyes
